md:
giải nghĩa từ "distorted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Distorted (adjective):
	+ Meaning: altered or changed in a way that is not natural or normal; not accurate or true.
	+ Vietnamese: bị bóp méo, sai lệch, không chuẩn.
	+ Example sentence: "The mirror reflected a distorted image of my face."
	+ Related words: distorted, warped, twisted, perverted.

* Distorted (verb):
	+ Meaning: to change or alter something in a way that is not natural or normal; to make something inaccurate or untrue.
	+ Vietnamese: bóp méo, sai lệch, làm sai lệch.
	+ Example sentence: "The politician's words were distorted by the media to make him seem more extreme."
	+ Related words: distort, warp, twist, pervert.

Note: The verb "distort" can also mean to change the shape or sound of something, such as "The loud music distorted the sound of the singer's voice."
html:
giải nghĩa từ "distorted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Distorted (adjective):

    • Meaning: altered or changed in a way that is not natural or normal; not accurate or true.
    • Vietnamese: bị bóp méo, sai lệch, không chuẩn.
    • Example sentence: "The mirror reflected a distorted image of my face."
    • Related words: distorted, warped, twisted, perverted.

  • Distorted (verb):

    • Meaning: to change or alter something in a way that is not natural or normal; to make something inaccurate or untrue.
    • Vietnamese: bóp méo, sai lệch, làm sai lệch.
    • Example sentence: "The politician's words were distorted by the media to make him seem more extreme."
    • Related words: distort, warp, twist, pervert.

Note: The verb "distort" can also mean to change the shape or sound of something, such as "The loud music distorted the sound of the singer's voice."
